title: Start
body:
Hello there Player, nice to meet you!
My name is Nuddinyoure and I'm here to help you become a powerful wizard!
You will face 3 different challenges, each one is made to make you stronger
The first challenge will be about English, followed by Maths and finally Science
After all this you will be well prepared to face the all sorts of problems as a wizard
Are you ready? 
[[Yes|Choice]]
